name: Zygarde 10% Forme
description: The Order Pokémon. Its sharp fangs make short work of finishing off its enemies, but it's unable to maintain this body indefinitely. After a period of time, it falls apart.

abilities.name: Aura Break
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is in battle, the boost of Fairy Aura and Dark Aura abilities is reversed, Any applicable move type activated within 100 feet deals half damage instead of double.

abilities.name: Power Construct (10%)
abilities.description: When Zygarde 10% is reduced to less than half of its maximum HP, it changes to Zygarde 50% Forme and recovers all hit points.
